Running back inside an upstairs, you grabbed your phone on the bed, looking at the screen, seeing it was Saturday. "What a relief!", you told yourself, thinking it was a school day. Texting your friends, you see if they wanted to meet up at the mall, both replying with a simple "Yes!". Ready to once again leave the house, you abruptly ran into your mother Scarlett.

"Sarah!, I'm glad I caught you, I need to head over to the mall, would you like to come?" she asked you. Grabbing her purse, she was in a rush. "Now where did I put my keys again?" she was speaking out loud, looking everywhere but the key rack itself.

Sometimes you wondered, how your mom raised you and Nat being so scatterbrained. "I just texted Jenna and Madison to meet up there, Can we pick them up?" you asked her looking at her still struggling to find them. Rolling your eyes, "Mom have you looked on the key rack by chance?"

Scarlett stood up straight, walking over like she knew the whole time, "Of course I knew they were there.". Scarlett took a moment going over the check list in her mind, "Keys, Mall with Sarah, Pick up Natalie.". Walking out the door with you to the car "We're all ready.".

Sitting in the front seat, your mother did the same starting the car to drive. "Mom can you try not embarrassing me today too, I'm 16 I wanna just spend the day with my friends.". Dreadful you might hurt your mother's feelings by this conversation.

Scarlett smiled "Of course sweetie, you won't even know I'm there.". Taking the hint quit well she knows how it is to want some space. "I just need to grab a few things, some new bra and panties, I'm sure I'll find more stuff to do will you three have fun."

Driving down the road, you picked up Jenna first. You heart raced in wonder watching her coming out of the house. She was looking very gorgeous just by her face alone she did such a splendid job on her make up. "Hey, Ms. Anderson it's good to see you.". She warmly said closing the door behind her.

"Please Jenna, You can call me Scarlett, We've know each other for so long now." she tells her.

Next up was Madison who was walking down her drive way an looking like she just woke up. "Hey *yawn* Everyone, ready to go?". She scratched her bed hair that was still a mess. She got in the car sluggishly as if she was using a lot of energy to open the car door alone.

Finally arriving at the Mall, you waved bye to your mother. "Alright, Were should we start?" you asked your friends. Before you gave the a chance to speak, your phone buzzed suddenly, from a recent text. Looking at the message it was from Trish.

"Hey Sarah! Don't forget to get Mary a gift for her birthday on Tuesday. " the message read.

You completely forgot about Mary birthday was next week, luckily your at the mall and there's a toy store just farther in. "Hey I need to go grab a gift for a friends birthday so I'll.." before you could finish Jenna interrupts you.

"I thought we could go try on some clothes first, I saw a cute dress, an a matching Bra and Panties I feel in love with." Jenna eyes were sparkling in shine, looking at you for a response.

Madison was already sitting down on a bench figuring she was standing for too long. "How about we *Yawn* see a movie? Or go to the food court, either way I need something to eat."

Your friends seemed to wanna start at different destinations. "We'll I need to get a gift for a birthday, so is it alright if I go to the toy store to get a gift first?".

Both Jenna and Madison laugh. "You wanna go alone, you sure you'll be alright and not get yourself in trouble." Jenna remarks laughing again.

"Hey I can keep myself controlled." you told them taking it as an offense. "Most of the time." you whispered quietly so they wouldn't hear that.

The three of you talked a bit more of the fun that was gonna be had today before you decide to start with Heading towards...

1133.content:

"You see, Jenna, even Sarah's hungry. Let's head over to the food court and grab something," Madison exclaimed.

Jenna huffed with annoyance, "Alright fine, but can we try and hurry I honestly want to check out those super cute new undergarments after," she informed the both of you.

Madison stood from the bench strolling between the two of you heading right for the food court on autopilot. Jenna gripped her arm around yours, hauling you along in a rush to reach her destination next. Arriving only to notice every table crowded during a lunch hour.

"Aww well, we tried looks like we should come back in a bit. Come on, Sarah, let's go pick out some clothes for me," Jenna said, stretching your arm carelessly in the process.

"Would you relax, Jenna, theirs a nearby table open next to Mama Camilla's Pizzaria. I could go for some of that actually," Madison stated while drooling.

The three of you quickly sat down together at the table. Jenna seems to be unhappy still, but you knew she would soon shift her attitude after having a hot slice of pizza. "I'll go up and order. What do we want," you asked, placing your cell down on the table.

"I want meatballs and peppers," Madison replied as you glanced over to Jenna.

"I'll have mushrooms," Jenna muttered.

You giggled and blushed to her way of being so adorably upset. "Ok, I'll order us a large. Mind watching my phone till I get back, Jenna," you told, before walking away from them. The girl let out a mild temper from envy of her job as she typed in your order, telling you to wait on the side until ready. You move off to the side as instructed, standing next to a person in a pizza mascot outfit handing flyers. None of the people strolling by even noticed Luna's action of what she was doing to you from the size of the thing hiding her. "Hehe, still think I look funny now cue ball. I'm guessing you're not alone," she whispered glancing around, finding Jenna and Madison perching in the distance. "Oh, there's your dweeb friends. You probably order some food here just now," Luna said, forming a devilish grin, "Which gives me a perfect idea,"

Luna marched behind the counter, placing you down to undress out from the humiliating outfit. You could do nothing but watch her, attired in a red three button work shirt, wearing some black legging below with sneakers. She was slightly sweaty from bearing it showing pit stains. "Uh, I'm all gross. I can't wait to be home and shower. But, I can't say the same for you, squishy," Luna informed you as she picked you up carrying you to a coworker flipping dough.

"Hey, Steph can you do me a favor?" Luna requested.

The girl was busy finishing the previous order before working on your's next. "Sure, Luna, what you need," Steph answered.

"Thanks, So I have some friend's sitting out there I was wondering if you can use some of this fresh dough I got from the back to make it," Luna stated, placing your balled form with the other precooking dough. Luna smiled evilly and waved goodbye to you as she was stepping away.

"Wait a sec, LUNA!" she called out. "Ugh, there's not enough here to make them the order. Oh well, I'm sure they won't know if I use some from another ball,"

Your eyes gasped as the girl mixed you with another flour ball stretching and pulling you out. She was then pounding you falt with her bare hands, smoothing you into a cylinder shape. You tired yelling for her to stop by you had no mouth to do so, only watch as she dumped a fresh coat of sauce that stung your eyes. Following it up by covering them with several kinds of cheese and the toppings, dimming your vision completely then next tossing you in the oven. The heat made you sweat but not for long as you slowly harden from the mixed dough it rose to a layer of crust. After several minutes you were removed, the sharp blade of a pizza cutter divided you up and ready to serve.

"All done Luna," Steph replied.

Luna stepped over, whiffing your new hot delicious form salivating ready to take a slice herself. If not for the fact she wanted to view your friends devour you themselves. "Can you bring it to them? I need to get some more things from the back," Luna asked, watching from a distance.

Steph kicked the side door carrying you along and gently placing you down in front of Jenna and Madison. "Here's your order your friend says enjoy, "Steph said unamused walking away.

Madison also inhaled your delightful pizza virtue scent, pulling a slice for herself. The cheese had strings stretching from to the rest of your body as placed it down on the plate. "Hmm, this smells so good. Aren't you going to have a slice, Jenna," Madison asked bitting into your body, chewing it up.

"Yeah, but where's Sarah?" Jenna question grabbing a perfect piece of the pie.

"She probably went to the bathroom just dig in," Madison said with a mouth full of you.

All you could do was sit there, experiencing your unaware friends consume you up. You could physically feel the two of them chewing you up from their mouths. Your body coated in saliva and torn apart to pieces by their teeth until finally there were two pieces left. One was your arm; the other was your entire head holding your morality.

"UUrrp, Man this crust is the best. I wonder what's the ingredient is," Madison said, let out an echoing belch. "Ugh, I can't eat another slice. What about you," she asked Jenna.

"I'm starting to worry about Sarah. She's been gone for too long I should go check on her," Jenna said, finishing her last slice.

"Who cares more for me is all," Madison declared ripping another piece off.

"Hey save one for her," Jenna said with annoyance staring at the people walking in and out form the stalls.

"Just eat the last one. We can buy Sarah one to eat as we walk," Madison said, stuffing her face whipping the sauce with a napkin away.

Jenna doing the unthinkable, grabbed the last of yourself chowing down still observing the people exiting to make sure you weren't sticking to any girls butt.

"Did you two enjoy the pizza," Luna asked, walking up to unsuspecting friends. "I hope you did I added squishy to the mix," she laughed, taking the empty tray.

"Oh my god," Jenna shrieked swallowing the last of your body, "We ate her! Madison! We ate Sarah! I think... I think I'm going to vomit," she stated, begging to dry-heave.

"Stop!" Madison responded, covering Jenna's mouth with her hand. "You're making a scene. Look I know we both eat here, but I'm not going to have you make me regurgitate her back up here. We don't know which one of us ate her so who knows which stomach she's inside right now." Madison declared, settling Jenna down for the moment.

"What are we going to do," Jenna suggested looking at her gut. "Crap! Sarah's mom, what are we going to tell her?"

Madison pondered as she remarked your left behind cellphone on the table, "I got it! Go into Sarah's phone and text her your mom picking us up later and were going to stay here longer,"

Jenna seized your phone as she heedlessly went along with the plan. She then stuffed your phone in her bra for the meantime. "This is horrible! Sarah told me about Trish and Jack having times becoming a body part or fat on a person body. What if that happens to her also?" Jenna said, feeling even more sick to her stomach.

"Relax let's just get out of the crowd to think about this," Madison reassured her as they stood up and left.

The two began walking as you sloshed around in one of there stomaches but whos...

11331.content:
It is apparent that you had to be floating in Jenna's stomach, as her voice was emanating closer over your head, then Madison's who was approaching from the gap between the girls outside. However, to your friends, it was an unknown resolution as both were unsure who was the one that ate you.

"I'm convinced I was the one swallowed Sarah," Madison announced, after tasting a distinct flavor of cinnamon mixed in her new belch just now.

Jenna meanwhile tore her lovely hairs outward over the sheer alarm from the disaster, "How can you be so confident, Madison? My gut feels bloated enough to being supporting her inside like a child." she stated, showing her small pudgy belly off. Jenna suddenly let out another crowd-drawing belch. The taste of your organic flavoring mixed with pizza hitting her tastebuds again. "Ugh!" Jenna exclaimed with disgust, covering her mouth as she blushed from the attention, "Even I taste elements of Sarah in my mouth, Madison. We're never going to identify who consumed her if at this point." Jenna argued with supporting evidence, as her stomach rumbled loudly with discomfort. "Burp!" Jenna gave another air bubble slip from her lips before abruptly groaning, taking a seat back down, to clutch her tummy. "Yecch! I can't tell if it's the pizza doing or even possibly Sarah causing me to feel this way? But, I seem nauseous." Jenna complained, massaging her sore abdomen as her face became sickly green.

"Yeah, I realize what you mean? I'm feeling sick myself momentarily. Can you probably ask your mom to pick us up?" Madison responded, grasping her stomach to signify her case as she sat across Jenna.

You could hear the tone of distress in Jenna's voice as she conversated with her mother over the phone. If you currently weren't so brokenly scattered into tiny bit's you could at least notify Jenna you're digesting within her body. You began to notice that her stomach already started to work in breaking your remains down. All the tinier bits of you were gone, leaving only a few larger piece like your current reasoning form holding strong. You then began to shake violently, swimming around in a wave pool of Jenna's stomach acid.

Outside Jenna stood up from the table, including Madison as they exited the mall. "Hey, mom! Thanks for picking us up." Jenna spoke, entering the passenger door. Madison jumped in the back as the two were transported home.

"What's wrong, sweetie? Your looking pale? Are you getting sick?"Jenna mother questioned her daughter, observing the way Jenna held to her gut with an ailment oblivious of the under tale.

Jenna began sweating a generous amount, how was she to explain that she has eaten her best friend as a hot serving dish. "Mom we..." Jenna was about to confuse when Madison jumped in the discussion.

Yeah, Jenna and I ate some undercooked pizza that gave us a stomach bug, Ms.Garden! Sarah didn't have any, so you could say she's the lucky one of the three of us." Madison jokingly stated that sent Ms. Garden in a giggling frenzy.

Jenna nervously peered out the window to draw attention away from herself. You, on the other hand, were much more vulnerable predicament as Jenna's body speed up the digestion process. Outside, Jenna's stomach roared with a loud gurgle.

The car came to a halt in front of Madison's household. "Thanks for the ride, Ms. Garden. Jenna, I'll text you later, for any news about Sarah." Madison stated before exiting the car.

"What did she mean by news about Sarah?" Ms.Garden asked her daughter revving the car engine again.

"Nothing mom..." Jenna replied unsettled, staring down to her rumbling belly.

"Oh, That's right! You intended to spend the whole day with her to decide on what to get for her birthday coming up soon. When is it again? August 18?" Ms. Garden rambled while driving home, "Hard to believe the girl's to be the big one-seven soon. It's funny how time raced by for the two of you since pre-school." she said, laughing to the memories.

Jenna started to reminisce, likewise, as did you. You completely ignored the fact your birthday was coming up with all the deliberate squishing you been putting yourself in lately. You insured if you make it out of this mess intact you promise Jenna not to get yourself squished for a whole week.

The car stopped again, pulling into the driveway. "Here we are Hunny! Let's get you in bed and give you some medicine to settle your upset tummy." Ms. Garden said removing the keys from the ignition.

Jenna entered the house, kicking off her shoes and headed straight to her room to crash. Her eyes couldn't move watching her stomach for any sign of Sarah showing when her mother came in with a bubbling glass of water.

"Here, you drink this." Ms. Garden smiled, handing it over as Jenna gulped it down, "Now you rest while I make dinner." she said last before kissing Jenna on the forehead.

Jenna couldn't sleep at all knowing the horror she committed, but one thing for sure was her stomach felt better after drinking that weird stuff. She let out a yawn as suddenly she started to feel very tired closing her eyes.

You could hear snoring after being drenched her contemporary beverage. Whatever was in it certainly did help her making things more harmful as you ultimately broke into a solid-liquid state. The stomach vale opened, transferring to Jenna's small intestines from there, you could feel parts of your body absorbed into Jenna's as nutrient and minerals. You grieved as maybe you weren't going to be getting out of this in one whole piece. Before moving to the large intestines and after that...
11331.title: From the mall to an anatomy lesson

choices: Choice A
Choice B
Choice C
113311.content:
Not long after Jenna fell asleep, you lost consciousness too as the last remnants of your goop-like body soaked into the lining of her large intestine. Small snippets of your life flashed before your eyes, your mind terribly anxious about whether you'd survive this situation or not. Trish, in her many warnings to you about your squishy condition, had definitely told a story about Jack getting eaten before, and obviously he wouldn't have been around for you to meet him if he didn't live through the experience, so you would probably be fine, you reasoned. However, Trish had neglected to tell the ending to that story, so you really weren't sure what to expect in the coming hours. You could only hope that you'd make it through digestion just like Jack did, but there wasn't anything you could do about it now, your time was up. The last thought to cross your mind was of Jenna, and how beautiful she had looked in her perfect makeup that morning. You were glad that out of everyone that could have eaten you, it was someone like her.

---

You awoke to realize that you were still very much alive, somehow. Wherever you were, though, it was pitch black. You couldn't see a thing. You tried to sit up and feel around, but got only a familiar lack of response from your body. Wherever you had ended up, you must be squished to something, you thought. Not long after this realization, everything sprung into motion as Jenna lifted her covers off of you and sat up, revealing your full situation with a decidedly bouncier gesture than you had anticipated. Your view from the front became a light blue, like light streaming in through blue curtains, but if you looked down you could see Jenna's stomach, her belly accented by the same light layer of chub you had loved looking at the past few months. Figuring out the rest of the details wasn't rocket science. You were on Jenna's boobs! ...Or maybe in her boobs? You couldn't yet tell.

---

Jenna shot up from her sleep, not remembering having fallen asleep in the first place. Her hair and clothes a sweaty mess, she grabbed her phone from her bedside table and immediately checked for any texts from Madison. Seeing none, she sent, "Any sign of Sarah yet? I haven't found her."
She didn't get any response right away, so she got out of her pajamas and put on a fresh outfit from her closet. She glanced at her phone again, but still nothing. Typical Madison, she thought. That girl wouldn't wake up before noon on a weekend if her life depended on it. Trying to keep a level head about the situation, she headed downstairs to fix herself some breakfast, but before she had time to prepare anything, she felt a buzz from her phone. That was fast, she thought, but as she checked the message all the color drained from her face. The text had come from Sarah's mom, and it read, "Is Sarah ok? She didn't come home last night, so I figured she spent the night somewhere. Let me know when u get this".

Completely at a loss, Jenna burst into tears. What could she possibly say? She thumbed idly through her old texts as the tears slid down her cheeks. However, the sight of an old text chain suddenly sparked an idea. "Trish!" she thought. "Trish will know what to do!"

---

You watched in amazement as the veil of Jenna's sleep shirt was quickly lifted to reveal her sizeable chest in all its glory. Looking into a full-length mirror across the room, you scrutinized every detail, trying to spot any sign of your form crushed or flattened to her breasts. What amazing breasts they were, far larger than most of the other girls in your class had, topped with thick nipples that just begged you to squeeze them. You had always admired Jenna's body, though you and she got along so well that you were worried you might mess up your friendship with her if you said something about your affections.

You were snapped back to reality quickly as Jenna turned to grab a bra out of a nearby drawer before squeezing her boobs snugly into it. You realized with embarrassment that you hadn't actually been paying attention to whether or not you could see yourself at all, and now you had missed your chance for a while. Though, you could think of two big upsides to the situation… If you had a visible mouth at the moment, you were sure it would be drooling.

---

"Aww Jenna, sweetie, it'll be okay!! This has happened to Jack like four times at least. Wouldn't be the first time for me either…" Trish trailed off from the other side of the phone.

"Y-You sure? It's just, I was so worried, and it was all my fault and-"

"I promise, we'll find her, it'll be okay. Try not to worry so much! About the whole thing with Ms. Anderson though, we should probably all talk to her together. Do you think you can round up Madison for me?"

"Uh-huh." Jenna sniffled, already feeling a lot better now that someone else had taken control of the situation.

---

The four women each found a seat in the Andersons' living room, Jenna and Madison sitting together on the couch with Trish and Scarlett in opposite corners. Not wanting to give any revealing details about her relationship with Sarah, Trish had introduced herself as a "family friend of Jenna's", which wasn't completely a lie, she reckoned.

After a sizeable amount of conversation, Scarlett sat stunned, having been told all about her daughter's secret squishy condition, as well as what had really happened the previous day.

"I… I wish she would have told me about this "squishy" thing. It's all so hard to believe! ...But you said she'll be fine in a week or two, right?"

"Yeah, that's how it's always been for me and my friends," Trish replied.

"...You're not mad at us, are you?" Madison said quietly, looking at the floor.

"No, dear. I know how much you care about Sarah, and I know you wouldn't do something like this on purpose. I just hope we get her back soon."

"Me too," said Jenna.

The trio stood up, seeing this as a good note to end on, but before they got far, Trish interjected. "Oh, girls, this is important. This is going to sound kind of gross, but since we don't know where Sarah is in your body, or even which one of you she's in, make sure you keep a close eye on anything that comes out of you. She'll most likely reform on her own, but there's a chance she might need some help. Keep an eye out." Jenna nodded worriedly, with Madison looking a little disgusted at the idea. And with that, the three departed, getting ready to begin a very stressful week.

---

You were shocked too, having heard the entire conversation that had just taken place from inside of Jenna's shirt. You would have liked to reveal your secret to your mother yourself when you were more prepared for it, but you were still really glad that you had such reliable friends looking out for you.

You knew from lots of staring that Jenna's bras usually did a pretty good job of keeping her boobs in place, but as she walked back to Trish's car, you still felt every light jiggle that came with her footsteps. Now knowing that you were almost definitely going to be fine, you were enjoying yourself a lot more from your private perch within your friend's incredible assets. Something you hadn't prepared for, however, was just how sweaty Jenna's boobs got. You weren't sure if it was the humid weather or her tendency to worry, but you felt every inch of your temporary home drip with sticky moisture. At first you found yourself overwhelmed covered in Jenna's sweat and its accompanying body odor, but as time wore on you found that you kind of liked it…

---

Choice A: Before the week is up, Jenna somehow figures out that you're her boobs. How will she react?

Choice B: After a week, you are naturally expelled from Jenna's body, but despite how carefully she's searching, she may or may not actually find you. What happens?

Choice C: Something seems to be different about your condition, as it's been two weeks and you're still stuck as Jenna's boobs. Could this be your permanent fate after all?
113311.title: A One-Way Ticket to Second Base

choices: "Warrior Princess" (Mary's turn to save Jack)
"Hide and Seek"
reader's choice
114.content:
You decided to head over to Trish's house to see how she was doing. You remembered that she was watching Mary, the young daughter of her friend Tina, so you knew that she might appreciate some help. Maybe even give you a nice “reward” for helping her out. Mary was also the little girlfriend of her son, Jack, with whom you don't get along with that well yet (though, you have a good feeling you’ll get along soon enough). He isn't a mean boy. He's actually quite well-mannered and a little shy. He's just a little bit selfish when it comes to his mother or Mary’s attention. Since Trish’s house was only a couple of blocks away from yours, you decided to hop on your bike and ride over. After around ten minutes, you had arrived at your destination. You set your bike on the side of the house and opened the door, where you saw Mary and Jack playing knight and princess. Mary was dressed in a pink princess costume, while Jack was wearing a cardboard suit of armor, while what you assumed was a dragon made of shoeboxes was toppled to the floor. They looked quite adorable. “Oh brave knight, thank you for freeing me from the dragon’s keep”, Mary said as she leaned back in Jack’s arms.

“Twas nothing, m’lady”, Jack said, trying to sound heroic… while struggling to hold up Mary’s weight as she leaned back. “That *grunt* beast won’t be *grunt* bothering…”

“Oh, hi Sarah!” Mary said as she noticed you, hopping up, causing Jack to yelp in surprise.

“Oh, uh… Hi, Sarah”, Jack greeted. He was still a bit shy around you, but he knew you were friendly.

“Hey there, kids”, you said, smiling as you knelt down.

Suddenly, you heard Trish walking down the stairs and talking on her phone, wearing a black skirt and tan blouse along with some stockings and a pair of black heels. “What do you mean something came up!?”, she said, practically yelling. “I have to meet with my investors in less than an hour! You agreed to watch the kids today!”

You remembered that she was trying to start up a company that produced what she called “Gummy material”, which was basically the same stuff that Jack (and now you) were made of. She knew that it could have all sorts of uses, and she had set up a meeting with some investors that were interested in helping start up her business. You just didn’t know that was today. “Heya Tri-”

“Not now, Sarah, I- Sarah? Oh thank god, you have the best timing”, Trish said as she hung up on who you assumed was her original choice for a babysitter. “Could you do me a huge favor and watch the kids for a few hours? I have an important meeting I have to get to, and I can’t leave these two on their own.”

“Sure”, you said, smiling and nodding. “I’d be happy to help out.”

“Thank you so much”, Trish said as she knelt down and hugged Jack and Mary. “You two be good for Sarah, okay? I’ll be back before you know it.” With that, she ran over to her car and drove off.

You looked down at the two kids, who were getting out of their costumes. “So, what do you want to do first?”, you asked.

“What do you mean?”, Jack asked.

“Are you saying you want to play with us?”, Mary said, both her and Jack seeming to be a little excited.

“Well, sure!” You knew that Jack was still shy around you, so you figured that if you played with him and Mary, it would help him warm up to you. It’d also impress Trish if you showed that you were getting along with her son.

“Alright!” They both cried in unison. “Let’s play…”
114.title: Babysitting

choices: The kids are still missing!
You see someone familiar talking to the kids (Natalie/Luna)
You find them on the monkey bars and the day goes without incident.
1143.content:
"Let's go to the park across the street!", Mary cried.

"Yeah! They got a new twirly slide and I really wanna try it out", Jack said.

You giggled as you watched them jump up and down in excitement, Mary's princess dress poofing up and down while Jack's cardboard "armor" clacked together. "Alright, but first you have to change out of those costumes."

The kids looked down at themselves and decided that you were right, quickly changing out of their princess and knight outfits and back into their regular clothes. They didn't even wait for you to let them know when you were ready; they just grabbed your hands and dragged you behind them, letting you go for a split second to lock the door before grabbing you again. "Saraaaahhh! Hurry up, let's go!", Mary whined.

"I wanna try out the slide before it gets too crowded", said Jack. "Come onnnn!"

"Okay, okay, geez", you said, struggling to keep up as they ran with you. Even though you were happy to take them to the park, you were getting more than a little annoyed with them at the moment. "At least they aren't mean like my sister", you thought. It just now occurred to you that the kids went to the same school as Natalie. "Lucky that the little guy doesn't share class with her", you thought. Your little sister was more like a little nightmare for you, and you were much older and bigger than she was. You could only imagine how much trouble someone as small as Jack would have with her... or really any other kid that found out about his condition. You were going to have to keep a close eye on him.

Once you and the children arrived at the park, they quickly ran off to the slide that Jack had been whining about since you left the house. He was a little selfish for a brief moment, quickly getting on before Mary and enjoying the slide first... until Mary had landed on him and you had to peel him off of the girl's butt. Afterward, he was a little gentleman, pushing Mary on the swings and making sure she got on the slides first. They looked quite adorable... but that changed when they started getting annoyed at you always following them. Jack had pretty weird behavior: He seemed to feel unsafe when he was alone, yet he craved independence. He was probably trying to look mature in front of Mary, but it came off as a little rude. "Y-you know, my momma lets us go to the park on our own", Jack said.

"Yeah, you don't have to follow us everywhere we go", said Mary. "You can just sit on the bench."

The girl barely managed to do 10 before collapsing onto a bench- wiping her hair from her sweat stained forhead before gulping down water.

Again, your body tried to pass out, but again, the smell kept you awake. It was a nightmare as the girl slid her disgusting feet all over you. Suddenly, you really missed Luna.

Eventually, your body did let you pass out after some weak running, slow step ups and some random warmups mid session to pretend she was doing things while secretly trying to rest. You passed out while she was doing situps, drowning in her toe flesh as they squeezed down on your face every situp.

You awoke after the pushups, a few stomps awakening you. Hazyness flooded over you as you slopped around in the shoe.

It felt like eternity before the girl took off her shoe. If you were in a better mindset you would of guessed that she waited for the majority of people to leave before changing, but at the moment you were just glad to be out of the shoe. The oppressive heat and stenched refused to leave.

Weird girl breathed heavily, sweat dripping down from her nose onto the floor as she glanced at her 'new' socks. They had already greyed out. Sweat stains highlighted the gaps between her toes. The girl lifted her foot up, glancing underneath at you for a moment, but she didn't see your tormented body, just the blackened marks from the shoe.
"Told mom it was pointless getting new socks-" The girl mumbled, not hearing your cries as she slammed her foot back down. You passed out.

Again, you woke up from the stench, only this time it lasted longer. The last you saw was going back in the shoe.

This became your life for the week. The girl wore you home, before sitting down and tucking you with her foot under her sweaty ass as she played games late into the night. Your mind felt like it was going to crack as she wore you into bed. Disgust flooded your entire being as the girl didn't take you off, not even for a shower. Every morning, you heard her use a can of deoderant after what you assume is the sound of her wiping herself down with a towel or wet wipes.

Classes were spent boiling in her shoe as she pinned you down- occasionally shifting or wiggling. You never got used to the smell, you just drooled- wishing you were back with Luna.

The weekend was just more of what she usually did at home, gaming- her toes occasionally played with the wires as you tried to vomit but lacked the ability. It was by far the worst week you've had, your foot fetish might of even been cured.

You eventually got the name Shelly, but you really didn't care at this point. After 5 days, you started nibbling your way out. As gross as it was, you feared she would never take you off at this point. After two days though, you had made no progress other then blackening your tongue as well.

It barely even registered when the girl took you off.
"Sorry guys, had to slip my socks off- they were gross. Gross, no, I don't think you'd want to sniff them" She looked annoyed as she spoke down the mic.

You actually thanked her while choking back tears as the girl tossed you over her shoulder towards a pile of clothes. It was like getting tossed in dung, but it was still better then being stuck on her foot for a second longer.

The sock stiffened as the sweat and dirt dried. As gross as it was, she wouldn't wear them for a while at least.
11512311122.title: Regretting the Switch

choices: The sock won, you're going in the wash
It's a draw, you fall to the ground- free
The foot won
115123111223.content:
Dazed, you could only watch as the girl got up, slipping out of her clothes as she left. You waited for a moment before hearing the shower turn on.
"Finally-" You gagged, trying to rip yourself off the steaming pile. You felt gross, you've been through gross before but-

The shower turned off, barely any time to get a proper wash. The door opened up, showing Shelly in all her glory as she thudded over- picking up an old pair of Pajama's. This girl- was gross, you would usually be happy seeing a naked girl and- looking at her- she looked pretty cute. It was just the-

Shelly picked up a sock, looking disappointed as she saw how many holes were in it. The sock itself- looked filthy, far worse then the one you were attached to. The girl shrugged, putting it back in the pile rather then throwing it out. She opened a draw, before slamming it shut. Her eyes soon fell on you.
"No way-" you mumbled, "Y-you filthy-"

Shelly yawned, picking up your sock and giving it a sniff. She winced a little, also noticing that the sock maintained it's form rather then flopping. She shrugged, unable to hear the screams as she turned the sock inside out. She really couldn't be bothered getting told off by her sister again for wearing dirty socks, at least the outside part would look fine. Shelly couldn't really get why people cared, you can't smell her on the internet and it's just socks.

You- on the other hand- completely disagreed with this logic as you were now laying inside of the sock rather then outside. A set of toes pushed their way in as you prayed the girl's shower had improved things, but it looked like she just rinsed her body and didn't actually wash her feet.
"N-noo-" You weakly spoke, desperatly holding your breath as the socks slid over you.

Shelly simply smiled, wiggling her toes as she tried to breakup the hardened sweat. Slamming her foot down on you, she casually sneaked out of her room to go to the kitchen and grab a midnight snack.

You were- in such a bad position. Whatever crumbs and gunk the girl stepped in on the way over was quickly jammed down your neck by her oppressive toes. Her heel, continued to slam into your crotch each step as you were brought back into the hell you experienced for the past week. Much like with Luna, the stomps would eventually cause you to cum involuntarily which made things all the worse as at least there was some form of hotness to Luna's foot, her personality scared you but you would prefer being found by her now rather then spend another night like this.

However, you weren't in a state to make a choice. You were soon back under the bed coveres, only this time strapped to the girls gross foot. You eventually just passed out from exhaustion.

You fazed out, dazed and confused, you licked the disgusting feet out of boredom and to get used to it. Once again, you were in class after Shelly woke up, dressed and stomped her shoes on with you still attached. This was currently day four, she'd worn these socks for well over a week now out of sheer lazyness. On day two, your head had peeled free due to her wiggling toes- making weird awkward girl get a hobby for grabbing your face with her toes and jamming it into her toejam. Too battered to do anything, you would just whimper as you were forced to sniff.

Day four was the breaking day, you licked unhappily and dazed out. Some part of your brain hoped to clean her foot to make this experience more bareable- but little did you know- some part of Shelly's brain must of liked it too as she subconciously made this sock her favorite sock.

After the long walk home, kicking her shoes off and heading upstairs, the girl finally peeled her sock off with some difficulty.

A knock came at the door, usually indicating food was ready- sitting just outside.
"Hey sis- uh- listen, I know Mum and Dad aren't around and stuff- but- I'm kinda worried about... this" The voice spoke, Shelly paused, rolling her eyes as she tried to peel the rest of the sock off. The voice spoke again "Can you... at least leave your clothes outside for a wash?"

You would be jumping from joy, but you were currently going through your worst nightmare yet. Your head, after being pressed so hard into her toe flesh- refused to detach. You shook with fear as the sock and Shelly's foot played tug of war with you for a moment until..
