You manage to get free but Yuri notices you as she enters her room.
1151232.content:
During your sprint in a eccentric chance of a fun afternoon, you decided on running towards the shoe on the right hoping it was the right call. Grabbing on to the counter of the shoe, hoisting up your body over the collar, you crawled on your knees towards the front end of the shoe. Inside the world seemed much quitter for the most part, however the insole was grimy and rather wet with the outline of a person's foot. While the air having a miasma scent flowing around, was nothing new you had dealt with before, seating yourself at the cap you patiently waited for the thrill ride to begin.

Meanwhile outside Luna was still chatting with Yuri, "So what are your plans after the game?" hoping to make friends with her but was only received with a silence stare. "OK? Well lets give it our best." giving Yuri a teammate pat on the back exiting the lock room.

Yuri was thankful the strange girl she called a teammate was final gone. Since moving to America she has found their custom very strange along with difficulty to adjust too. Her schedule mainly consisted of school and home, her mother desperately wanted her daughter to go outside more to experience her new home, but was opposed by her father making sure all her daily school work was finished. This made it difficult for Yuri to make friends but of course her language barrier was another issue.

Still waiting you wondered if you had probably made the wrong choice in a small fear Luna knows you're inside her shoe an was going to remove you vigorously or worse play along with her prey. Lying down on your back you cautiously poked out towards the opening of the shoe, looking up at a gorgeous Yuri with her bare foot coming directly to you a squeal of joy escapes your lips. However in a unsuspected turn of event you see full perspective of her dirty foot, from the heel to her sole was covered in dirt as it slowly brushed over your body.

Yuri toes reached the cap placing her foot down on the floor down upon you, feeling the full weight crush you underneath her, squishing you out more then planned as a perfect gummy insole. Slipping on her other shoes Yuri ran out of the locker room, as her team huddle together.

"Ok I'm putting in Luna, Kristen, Riley, and you Yuri in first." the couch spoke loudly the team, as the four girls ran on to the court. The referee blew into there whistle starting off the game, the enemy team serving first as the ball was heading right towards Yuri. Running in the direction towards the ball, striking the ball high in the air, giving Luna a opening to spike it back for a first pointer. "Nice Job Yuri! Keep it up." Luna praised out.

Simultaneously as the game progressed, you were in paradise with each tread as she stepped down on your squishy body. You smiled in delight unable to control your carnal emotions concealed, as Yuri dart's across the gymnasium while crowd cheers her on. Things got more searing as her dirty heel an sol, whipped away it's grimy appearance on you, whilst her sweat seep into your body.

The whistle blew once again as the teams switched it's players out, Yuri taking the opportunity removed her pleasurable foot away from you. "Watashi no ashi wa itaidesu!"(Man my feet are aching!) Yuri commented rubbing her sore right foot "Watashi wa kono gēmu ga mamonaku owaru koto o nozomimasu." (I hope this game's over soon.). Luna sitting right next to her covered her nose, "Phew I can't belive her feet smell that bad." as she began grinning "I'll have to remember next time I get a hold of squishy." she laughed. Unaware of the matter you already placed yourself in the situation, as Yuri placed her foot back inside the shoes, she shivers unsteady from a unusual gooey substance within her shoe.

"Yuri!" the couch called out "I need you back in there." she barked, as she got up an ran back on the court, her mind wondering on the contents within her own shoe. Each step taken *Squish* she could feel it compress between her toes, *Squish* what exactly was it, *Squish* she had to know but for now she had to focus on the game. After a few paces *Squish* she could feel it again all wet and sticky, was she going to be alright should she speak up before it could be to late.

You however were surprised, as your little unsuspecting fun ride was noticed now. Each time Yuri wanted to avoid stepping into you, the more she had to unfortunatley. Squashing your body like play doh below her, oozing your body out of the crevices. "So close!" you mentally screamed "So close!" once again "one more step will probably do it come on." waiting at the apex of satisfaction.

"Yuri it's coming at you!" Amber shouted, she begun to panic if she wanted win she has to move her right foot now, but if doesn't she cost her team the game. Unable to move her right foot in fear, she knew she had to not let the them down, Crushing her right foot to the ground heavily, she dove for the ball. The buzzer went off as Yuri fell to the floor, "It's over the Bull's won the game!" as the team and people screamed out in joy, the hudle around Yuri in amazment she won the game, while you shouted in pleasurable moan to in culmination.

"Nice going!"everyone congratulating Yuri as Luna hugged her closly. "Alright girls nice job Yuri!" the couch added on, as they all entered the locker room. The team slowly undressed out of there sweaty damp clothes, Luna removing her dirty shorts and panties, "What's the matter Yuri?" she asked her. Yuri was scaried to remove her shoe to what she might find, "Watashi wa daijōbudesu."(Nothing I'm fine.). Luna shrugged her shoulders as she made her way to the showers, leaving Yuri alone.

She looked to make sure everyone was either gone or still in the shower, as she undressed herself fast pulling off her sweaty attire and stuffing them into her gym bag. Placing her pervious school outfit upon herself, she left quickly before anyone noticed she didn't even shower also, only wanting to get home as soon as possible. Once again with each step *Squish* she could feel it *Squish* inside her shoe, *Squish* it was a mircle no one else heard the noise besides her. Walking on the bus taking her seat in the back row, her eyes were fixed on her foot, squashing whatever the contents was with her toes. Ready to just remove her shoe right then, Luna walked on seating herself with Yuri. "Hey didn't see you in the shower?" she giggled "No need to worry I won't tell anyone." looking at the expressionless partner "You know sometimes I don't like showering either but those have rare exceptions." she said smiling playfully.

The whole ride Luna bragged on about herself inculding you in her stories an more importantly about your rare condition, which would have given Yuri a possible answer to her shoe dilemma, if she had been listening. "Well here's my stop see you on monday." Luna waved goodbye, arriving at the next stop that was Yuri. Walking off the bus she had forgotten it was a bit of walking distence to her household, making Yuri stumble after just a block, craving to know an answer.

"Tadaima!" (I'm home!) she called out, breathing relief she did't have to remove her shoes as she walked in, she ran up the stairs with the wet splotch sound trailing behind her. She closed her door, untying her shoelaces she slowly removed her naked foot. Her toes withdrawn outwards, closing her eyes as she sees there perfectly fine, she then looked over the rest of her foot seeing the freashly washed underbelly, she feeling it over it making sure nothing was wrong. Only she was impressed an perplexed, the feeling was smooth and freash just like a babies, as if all her dead skin was stripped clean by something.

Lifting up the shoe she looked inside but saw nothing out of the ordinary, except the smell of her dirty shoe. Taking another deep breath she inserted her hand, feeling around but once again nothing. Prehaps she wondered if she was worring about nothing as she placed her shoe back on the floor hearing the sound of her parents coming home she exited the room to greet them.

As the door closes yet again, you calmly exhale yourself in a hoope of not being noticed. "Thank goodness! I wasn't expect such her not wearing socks. What a rush!" you were shaking form the triumph "Now I just need to get out of here." trying your best to remove yourself form her dirty insole you began tugging but didn't seem to budge. "Ok relax not so bad Sarah! Could be stuck with someone or somewhere worse.", pulling your body free once again but realizing..
1151232.title: Be Careful What You Wish For....

choices: Sarah is still stuck to the insole, but Yuri sees her and may be able to help
Yuri doesn't see anything. Sarah has melted into the insole completely!
11512321.content:
Sarah attempted once more to pry herself free from the grimy insole she was currently flattened to, but it seemed as though the volleyball game and subsequent trip home did more of a number on her squishy form than she had anticipated.

"Oh well! Assuming she doesn't wear these sneakers until tomorrow, I should have enough time to get myself free by then. No sweat!" Taking a second to reflect on her predicament, she giggled to herself. "Okay, well no more sweat. Starting soon."

Having nothing better to do for the moment, she strained to look outside the opening of the shoe she was stuck in, trying to gather any useful or at least interesting information about her surroundings. From what little she could see, she could tell her shoe had fallen on its side, and it seemed to be facing Yuri's bed. Within the darkness under the bed, she could barely make out a few loose piles of dirty laundry. "Hmph, not a very interesting view. I wish I could see what the rest of her room looks like," she thought to herself.

Just then, Yuri came back into the room, but all Sarah could hear were the sounds of a chair being pulled out and sat in, and the occasional page being turned. Yuri must have been working on her homework. This tedium continued for what felt like several hours, but in reality could have been as little as thirty minutes. Without a clock to look at, it was hard for Sarah to tell. This was always her least favorite part of the trouble she got herself into, was the waiting around for something exciting to happen as the world around her treated her like an ordinary object. Eventually, after some time, a voice called up the stairs to Yuri's bedroom. 「友里！ご飯よ！」(Yuri! Time to eat!)

Yuri stretched her arms and stood up from her desk, happy to be given an excuse to take a break from her studies. As she clamored down the stairs, Sarah was left to sit in silence for another undefined stretch of time, until eventually she heard voices coming back up. 「…それに、部屋はめちゃくちゃだよ。ちゃんと片付けなã •いね。」(And another thing, your room is a disaster. Make sure you clean it up.) 「は～い。」(Okay.) Sarah couldn't tell what the voices were saying, but it sounded like Yuri was getting chewed out by her mother for something or other. After a few minutes of things being shuffled around, she felt her shoe being picked up, and she saw Yuri's face from below as the two descended the stairs. Yuri gingerly placed the sneaker next to its partner on the ground by the back door of the family's home. "Oh good, a change of scenery while I work on reforming."

After sitting through the boring homework session, Sarah could already feel herself returning to her original 3D self, albeit slowly. Some time after the lights in the entryway had been shut off for the evening, she realized she once again had moveable arms, and the rest of her top half was free as well, though her hips downwards were still stuck to the shoe's interior like a sticker. She set about picking at her legs, trying to at least get them to peel off, when she heard someone approach the room she was in. 「寒くて眠れないな。」(I'm too cold to fall asleep.) This unfamiliar voice must be Yuri's other parent, figured Sarah. Still unable to understand the Japanese Yuri's family spoke at home, she was at first confused what Yuri's father was doing up this late at night, but the sounds that followed clued her in pretty quickly.

Click! VRRRRRR...

An air vent kicking on. It sounded really close nearby, too. Sarah thought nothing more of it at first, but as time went on, the shoe's familiar stench began to increase in intensity, as a little bit of leftover sweat seeped out of the insole around her. "Whew! What's going on?" If she was being honest with herself, the increased stink was kinda turning her on, but before she could properly enjoy the new sensations, she looked down and saw her partially reformed body beginning to drip, bit by bit. "Uh oh..." She frantically scratched at the lower half of her body, still mostly stuck in the insole, but even as she did so her hands started to splatter against the ground, quickly becoming less and less effective digging tools. "This... could be a problem." She was still mostly optimistic about getting out of this situation sooner or later, as a single day was certainly not the longest she'd been stuck in someone's clothes, but she couldn't help but worry a little bit over the fact that at present, not a single person knew where she was.

-----

After finishing her breakfast, Yuri got ready to head out the door, not wanting to be late for school two days in a row. She ran into the hallway, grabbed her shoes, and began to put them on. As usual, she wasn't wearing any socks, not liking the way they constricted her naturally sweaty feet and locked in all the moisture, making them feel slimy. As she lined her foot up with the opening for one shoe, she happened to glance inside the other, but what does she see?
11512321.title: Trapped as an Insole

choices: Trust Sarah and wear her. They can figure it out tonight if it doesn't help.
Wear Sarah to school, but talk to Luna. She can't be as bad as Sarah says.
Bring Sarah to her parents to see if they can help.
115123211.content:
Sarah is excitedly waiting for the bare foot to go into her shoe again when she sees Yuri look do a double take then freeze while looking at her. Her vision becomes a cartwheel as Yuri shrieks and tosses the shoe away from her. She can hear Yuri's mom ask something and Yuri answering, but you can't understand them. "Probably just saw a spider or something," Sarah says, "hopefully it's not inside me. I don't want her deciding to wear different shoes."

Sarah hears Yuri say something in Japanese again, then in English "Who said that?" Sarah is shocked, since even though she'd felt her mouth move, she's so squished she shouldn't have been able to talk aloud. She stays silent even as Yuri picks up her shoe prison and looks directly at her, hoping she'll write it off as her imagination. Yuri whispers a few things in Japanese while Sarah waits to be put on, but then in English Yuri says "I was right, those ARE eyes!"

Sarah is overwhelmed with nervousness. She still feels like she always does when all smudged up, like a formless mass with her senses spread evenly across her, but she must have reformed a little without realizing it if Yuri can see her. This has never happened before, and dhe should be too tiny to see easily regardless. She realizes she needs to buy time to figure out what's going on. Not to mention keep this innocent girl from realizing she had a willing pervert in her shoe. "Uh, Yuri? Um, oh! Thank goodness you can see me?... can you actually see me? You shouldn't be able to see m- I MEAN I'm surprised you can see me," she fumbles out, wishing she was a better actress. She realizes she can indeed feel what must be her mouth moving, but it feels odd and cumbersome.

Yuri is staring in slack jawed shock, then nods. "Sarah? Is that you?" she managed to say despite slipping out of English a few times due to her confusion. She carries the shoe across the room and turns it to the mirror.

Sarah doesn't have to fake surprise at what she sees. Instead of bits of her features poking out somewhere from her body, she sees her eyes clearly in the heel of the insole. She can't blink them, but she is able to move them to look around. In fact all her facial features are present and look like contours of the insole, her nose in the center of the arch and her mouth down by the toes. She's amazed as she's never seen her face this large before. She tries flaring her nostrils and sticking her tongue out and sees everything react like it would if she weren't squished, but she still feels her senses spread uniformly on her body like she expects. "Too bad. I love tasting her toes, but being able to lick them would be divine," Sarah thinks to herself.

Sarah tries to recover her composure and spin a cover story for the situation. "I'm so glad you found me! I hid in, er, I mean I got knocked into your shoe before the game yestetday. I was totally gonna get your help when I reformed, but something is wrong. Something is REALLY wrong. "

Yuri thinks about the special insoles she has that help with her foot funk issues and wonders if they're the cause. "Oh no! I have to help you! What should I do?" She asks fearfully.

Sarah realizes Yuri might have a full blown panic attack and that she needs to try and calm her down. "Itll be okay, I promise! This kind of thing happens to me a lot... not this EXACT thing, this is new. B-but it always ends up being fine! Just please don't tell anyone for now, okay?" She tries to reassure the scared girl.

"Are you sure? I'll definitely wear different shoes to school, but I can take you and see if someone can help," she offers. "Luna seems to-"

"DEFINITELY don't tell Luna! She hates me and will take advantage of this to do something terrible to me!" Sarah blurts in fear. She has a perverted thought though and decides she might as well take advantage of this herself. "Like I said, it'll be fine. And actually, being worn should, uh, help me with reforming. By, like, squishing me down so I can try to recover properly? Yeah, that's it. You should definitely wear me today. And don't feel like you have to wear socks all of a sudden. They'd probably,um, interfere with my, uh... my molecular... look, it doesn't matter, I just feel like it's a good idea for you to wear these shoes like nothing is different, okay? I have good intuition about this stuff"

Yuri looks unsure at Sarah. True these are her favorite shoes and the one Sarah is in felt extra comfy, but she would feel terrible walking on her all day. Not to mention how nasty her feet are by the end of the day. She truly believes no one would ever want to smell them, not knowing she is looking at someone who absolutely does. She decides to
115123211.title: Sarah is still stuck to the insole, but Yuri se...

choices: She decides to take her sneakers back to the store to have them examined
She tries to ask her classmates about the squishy feeling from yesterday
115123212.content:
The first thing Sarah felt when she came to was Yuri's foot rubbing all over her. Initially, she thought she might have still been dreaming, as the situation seemed almost too good to be true, but as she continued to wake up the events of the previous day slowly came back to her. The second thing she noticed was that she was still completely immobilized. "That's odd," she thought, "usually I'd be back to normal by now, even after melting like what happened last night. What gives?"

As always happened when she melted, she could feel all five of her senses across the entire length of her form, which in this case seemed to run the length of the sneaker's interior. But she didn't feel melty anymore. What she didn't realize was, Yuri's original sneaker insoles were made of a special absorbent gummy material designed to soak up sweat and grime. Those gummy insoles had a special effect on Sarah's squishy body, taking it in and essentially combining with it to create all-new padding. Sarah was now nothing more than the top layer of cushioning for a women's sneaker, and the shoe's owner had no idea she even existed! It would take nothing short of a miracle to get her out of this predicament now.

However, all questions of what had happened to her body quickly vanished from Sarah's mind as Yuri began walking to the bus stop. She could feel the pressure and heat of Yuri's sole all along her whole body, and it felt heavenly. The feeling stopped once Yuri got on the bus, but before Sarah had time for her mind to wander, Yuri's feet immediately began sweating up a storm, and Sarah could taste and smell every bit of it. It left her in a total daze, hypnotized by the all-encompassing miasma of her classmate's body odor. As Yuri arrived at school and went about her day, somehow the sweat and the stench only got stronger and stronger, no matter how high the A/C was turned up. Sarah's whole world became sweaty, stinky feet, and she could barely form a coherent thought.

Yuri, for her part, had noticed something strange going on within her shoes. It wasn't anything with her feet themselves. They always got very nasty very fast, no matter how often she washed them. No, her right sneaker felt unusually comfy compared to the left one. She had only just put the shoes on for the first time yesterday, and she didn't really remember what they had felt like, so maybe it was some sort of factory defect. Wait, actually, hadn't she felt something weird in her right shoe yesterday...? Trying to put two and two together, Yuri made a last second decision about her shoes before the end of lunch that day.
115123212.title: Extra Comfort

choices: Yuri decides not to buy them, and tries to return the other "deluxe insole" too
Yuri is convinced to get a matching insole, they're just too comfortable
1151232121.content:
Not fully remembering the events of yesterday and also wanting to avoid potentially embarrassing herself in front of her classmates by asking silly questions, Yuri decided it would be more prudent to ask a clerk at the store where she had originally purchased the shoes. That being said, this wasn't exactly an urgent issue, and there were much more important things to attend to for now. She figured she'd bring it up to her mother later on, if she happened to remember. Not sparing the matter a second thought, Yuri went back to class.

Sarah, down below, was getting even more than she had hoped for when she first came up with the idea to jump into Yuri's sneakers. The bottoms of Yuri's feet were firm but plush, applying a comfortable amount of pressure to the squishy girl without being overly constricting. Moreover, they generated so much sweat that it rolled off in small beads nearly constantly. Had Sarah been more capable of reflection at that moment, she might have stopped to wonder how Yuri could stand to have her feet so sweaty all the time. Instead, though, Sarah was practically high off of the foot funk that surrounded her, relishing in every drop of sweat and bit of toe jam that forced its way into her insole form. Beneath the logic of her conscious mind, some part of her wished that she could stay like this forever. Unable to do anything but passively soak up the larger girl's stink, she lay there in a state of extended bliss, her buttons being pushed over and over again by a girl doing nothing but going about her day normally.

When rational thought returned to Sarah, she noticed a reddish-orange light streaming through the windows of the back entryway that had recently become her new home. Was the sun setting? Or was it already the next morning? When was her shoe taken off? She couldn't seem to remember anything from the past day that wasn't feet. Attempting to get up once more, she felt rooted to the ground beneath her. "What's going on?" she thought to herself. "Why am I not reforming? Could this be Beta4? But from where??"
Fretting over the details of her mysterious imprisonment, Sarah sat in her shoe for hours as the room around her got darker and darker. This time, nobody came by to tidy up or fiddle with the thermostat. It was just hours of silence. At some point she finally realized panicking wasn't going to accomplish anything, and did her best to calm herself down. As thoughts of Yuri's feet filled her head once again, she slowly slipped into unconsciousness.

-----

When she awoke the next day, Yuri's foot was already on top of her. As nice as it was, she was starting to miss seeing the other parts of her captor. Though she had never really spoken to Yuri, she had always admired her gentle features from afar. She was beginning to wonder if she'd get a chance to actually talk to her anytime soon...

Meanwhile, Yuri was extremely nervous about having to speak to the cashier all alone. Her mom could have come in with her, but said she "needed the practice". In her head, she went over the English she was planning to say one more time before walking up to the counter.

"Hello, there seems to be a problem with my shoes."

"Oh, really? What's the matter with them?"

"Eeh, the left shoe is... not comfortable."

"Ah, sorry to hear you're not satisfied with them. I'll go get someone to take a look at them, why don't you sit over there while you wait?"

Yuri sat down on the nearby bench the employee had gestured to, and thought about what to do next. She reached over to remove her left shoe, but thought better of it for now. Even though she had just washed her feet two hours ago, she could already imagine the other customers might complain if she aired out her sneakers for too long. Absentmindedly kicking her feet back and forth, she looked around at the various shoes in the store until she spotted another employee walking towards her.

"So, one of your shoes doesn't fit as well as the other, is that right?" the employee started. "Do you mind if I take a look at it real quick?"

Bracing herself, Yuri wordlessly bent over and pulled her sneaker off of her foot. She hadn't really planned this part of the encounter through all the way, she was just now realizing. Though she tried her best to hide it, the shoe store employee's face wrinkled at the scent that immediately exploded out into the room once the seal of Yuri's sneaker was broken. "Do you uh... normally not wear socks?" she asked, not really thinking before posing the question.

"Ah... ehh..."

Trying to recover the situation, the employee quickly flashed a reassuring smile. "It's okay. To each their own, I guess, right?" Not wanting to press the issue any further, she picked Yuri's shoe up off the floor and peered inside, making sure to hold her breath as she did so. After holding it at various angles, poking and prodding, she eventually looked back to Yuri. "Nothing out of the ordinary here. Could I see your foot? Maybe it's something to do with your foot's shape, or something."

"...Oh! Okay." Yuri held her foot up in the air for the clerk to inspect it, turning her head slightly to avoid making eye contact as she did so.

"...Hmmm, nope, this seems like a decent fit. Guess I'll have to compare it to the right shoe, if that's okay." Lifting the other shoe up to her face, she noticed right away what Yuri must have been talking about. "What the heck? This insole is a totally different color!" Reaching out a finger to poke at Sarah's body only added to her confusion. "Whoa, this seems like high-grade stuff. Do we even sell these here?" Turning her attention away from the shoe, she asked Yuri, "Miss, I think this is your problem. Was the insole like this when you bought it?"

"Was it like...?" Yuri blushed and cocked her head to the side. The employee was speaking way too fast for her to keep up with the conversation, and she was totally lost.

"Uh... Here, lemme go talk to my coworker, I think he knows more about this type of stuff than I do."

Seeing the clerk wander off with one of her shoes, Yuri just sat and tried to piece together what was said to her a few seconds ago. Eventually she figured out the question from context, but as she thought about it, she honestly couldn't remember the answer. Were both shoes like that originally...?

The clerk came back a short while later with a taller man dressed in the same work uniform. "Hey, so it looks like somehow one of our deluxe insoles got into your sneaker before we sold it to you. I have no idea how that happened, but I've got another pair of those insoles right here that I'd be happy to give you a discount on, considering the circumstances. How does 50% off sound?"
1151232121.title: Practicing Her English

choices: Sarah is thrown into the garbage. There's a good chance she can finally escape!
Sarah is inserted into Yuri's new pair of sneakers. This is it.
11512321212.content:
Having never felt anything quite like the insole she had been wearing the past few days, Yuri simply couldn't help herself, and took the shoe store up on their offer. She didn't wait to unbox her newest purchase, slipping one of the insoles into her left sneaker before even leaving the mall. As she walked back to her mom's car, she was quite glad she had decided to say something about her uncomfortable shoe after all. Not to mention, that English conversation had gone pretty well, for the most part! She hopped into the passenger's seat, her mind already changing gears. "I wonder what Mom's got planned for dinner tonight?" she thought to herself.

---

Sarah had no way of knowing how dire her situation had suddenly become. Deep within the confines of her stinking prison, she couldn't have heard Yuri's conversation with the clerks minutes ago, or seen the new insole that now rested beneath Yuri's other foot. She was completely unaware of how unfortunately similar that insole looked when compared to her own melted body, and it was because of this that she still held out hope of communicating with her captor just as soon as she could figure out why she was stuck so tightly. Having snapped out of her foot stink-induced stupor for a few minutes, she mulled over her options in her head.

"Hmm... there really isn't much I can do, is there... I really thought Yuri would have realized something was off by now. Is she really that oblivious?"

Her chances at rescue seemed slimmer by the minute. One of her deepest fantasies was really happening to her, but in her daydreams she could always just snap back to reality when she got tired of thinking about feet. Down here, she wasn't really afforded that option. While Yuri was wearing her, wearing the shoe she was in, rather, the funk and the dampness and the dirt were nonstop. Her only breaks were when Yuri took her shoes off at the end of the day, and even then everything still smelled and felt like her feet. She was beginning to lose hope of being rescued anytime soon.

"Maybe jumping into these shoes wasn't such a good idea..."

---

During the few days after Yuri bought her new insoles, she thought once or twice about how nice they felt. She wished they could do more to remedy her foot condition, but at least they took all the pressure off of her soles. She used to get sore feet all the time, but it hadn't happened once since buying her new shoes. She casually resolved to wear them as much as possible in the coming months, and that was the last thought she gave her footwear for some time.

After a week had gone by, she overheard her classmates talking about a missing student.

"Yeah, she hasn't been in class for over a week now! I wonder why she stopped showing up?"

"This isn't the first time this has happened. Didn't she get stuck to that girl's butt once?"

"Haha yeah, better check yours tonight to make sure she's not there. I heard from Luna that sometimes she sticks herself to people on purpose."

"Oh my god, what a creep!"

Yuri hoped that wasn't true. She knew she and Sarah had never really spoken much, but she always seemed so nice! For a few minutes between classes, she couldn't help but worry about where Sarah had gotten off to, but her attention didn't linger on the matter for long as the next class began and the teacher passed out review sheets for the upcoming exam.

---

Sarah, meanwhile, wished she could get Yuri out of her head. The line had been crossed once and for all, and the fantasy wasn't fun anymore. She wanted out. She wanted to at least be able to say something to the girl who had dominated her every waking moment for the past week. But for the eighth day in a row, she was forced to reap what she had sown. Day in and day out, gulping down what must have been gallons of sweat and grime. Every breath she took was tainted with an intense, acrid smell, like holding her nose to a jar of vinegar, only stronger.

She could still keep track of how much time was passing, judging the days and nights by whether or not she was covered in feet, but she hadn't been counting the days since her imprisonment. Had it been six? Seven? Maybe it had only been two or three. Everything kind of ran together into one big memory of stench and filth. One thing she could clearly discern, however, was when Yuri was getting especially active up above, and considering the disorienting swinging sensation and the increased heat and pressure, now was one of those times. Probably gym class, not that the occasion mattered at this point. As Yuri's foot shed buckets of sweat down onto her, the smell magnified to an even more unthinkable degree. It was so overwhelming that Sarah couldn't keep herself conscious any longer, and the dank shoe around her quickly faded to black.

------

「くっさい！あの子はいつまで同じスニーカーをはくつã ‚‚り？」(These reek! Just how long does that girl plan on wearing the same pair of sneakers?)
「友里！今週末買い物に行きますよ！」(Yuri! We're going shopping this weekend!)

One day Sarah awoke to an unexpected sight. Her surroundings were blindingly bright, but as her eyes adjusted, she saw an enormous bedroom sprawled out before her. From the sporadic glimpses of it she'd gotten in the past, she knew this to be the bedroom of Yuri, the girl who had unwittingly tormented her for longer than she could accurately remember. After recovering from the shock of this sudden change, she instinctively knew what to do, and began trying with all her might to struggle, to budge any part of her lumped up form, but it still seemed she was unable to move even an inch. She could, however, move her line of sight, and it was at this moment she directed her gaze upwards. What she saw left her awestruck. Yuri's face, in all its massive glory, was like that of a goddess beholding her creation. To Sarah, whose memories of the outside world had begun to fade after spending so long with nothing for reference but the sweatiest feet she'd ever experienced, Yuri might as well have been a goddess. Looking up and down her body, Sarah was enraptured anew by the beauty she saw. In the heat of the moment, she had to struggle to remember that this was just her classmate she was looking at.

Yuri looked down at the dingy, worn insole she held in her hand, then over to her other hand, which held an insole in similar condition. She thought deeply about whether or not it was worth it to transfer these old insoles into the new sneakers her mom had made her buy. If she did decide to reuse them, and her mother found out, she knew she'd be forced to throw them away. They were pretty dirty, considering what she'd put them through the last two months. But they felt so good! She wasn't sure she'd be able to go back to regular insoles after having worn these ones.

Yuri had no idea that the simple decision she was making about her wardrobe would decide her classmate's very fate. Sarah looked on, still dumbfounded, as the amazon before her sprung into action, deciding in one simple motion how she'd be spending the next major part of her life.
11512321212.title: Make or Break

115123212122.content:
If Sarah could have screamed, she certainly would have as she realized where Yuri was about to put her. As she was gingerly lowered into the brand new sneakers, she braced herself for a renewed wave of foot stink, but breathed a mental sigh of relief when no odor came. Naturally, since Yuri hadn't worn the shoes yet, the only smell they gave off was a faint mixture of the rubber and fabric they were made of. Sarah wasn't sure she'd ever be able to get rid of the smell that still permeated her entire body, but compared to how things were just minutes ago, this situation was quite refreshing.

She took the opportunity to clear her head and try and remind herself of her real life, her life before Yuri's feet. Yuri wasn't her owner or her goddess, she was just a classmate at her school. Right, her school! Her family! God, they must have been worried sick about her this whole time. She wondered if Natalie had thought to tell her mom about her secret.

Completely wrapped up in thinking about the outside world, she failed to notice her new prison being carried over to the traditional spot by the back door. As the sun set and darkness descended upon the room, she fretted over her loved ones for hours. She felt so much regret for getting into this situation in the first place. She never imagined indulging in her fantasies would lead to this, and now there was nothing she could do to take it back. As the night passed, worrying turned to praying. It was clear divine intervention was the only thing that could save her anymore. Some spilled Beta4 solvent, anything! That was the last thought Sarah had before falling into a fitful sleep.

---

Wham!

Sarah awoke with a start, and immediately knew her wishes had not been granted. Yuri's full body weight fell upon her, and the world became a rush of dizzying motion. She knew from past experience that this meant Yuri was in a rush to get to school on time. Within five minutes, the freshly showered foot above her was already clamming up with new moisture. The familiar slamming sensation of Yuri's footfalls had stopped for now, but it made no difference. Sarah's one break from foot funk had come to an end. The somewhat comfortable, sporting-goods smell of the air around her quickly transformed into a relentless damp haze she was far too intimately familiar with. She didn't know how, but Sarah could subconsciously sense that her final hope of rescue was now totally gone. She thought about all the people in her life that she'd never get to see again. Or at least she tried to, but Yuri had already begun to sweat up above, and it kept dripping onto her, breaking her focus. Each droplet of foot sweat was like a concentrated bubble of the horrible odor that permeated everything around her. Even after having been exposed to it for months on end, Sarah couldn't hold her thoughts together in an environment like this. It was much easier to just... let go...

-----

"Heeey! If it isn't Yuri! I thought you were just staying in America the one year! How was your summer?"

Not long after entering the school building, Luna came running up to Yuri, energetically shouting and waving her arms. Though Luna spoke rapidly as usual, Yuri had been practicing English the whole summer, and was feeling more confident in her language skills.

"It was good! How was yours?"

"Oh, mine was just great. I've been hitting the gym a lot in preparation for volleyball season even though I know it's not coming up for a while and while I was there I met this totally cute guy and..."

The two girls headed towards their first class of the day, Luna chattering on at a pace most native English speakers would have trouble keeping up with, and Yuri nodding along politely. She just knew this school year was going to be a great one.

---

Sarah had spent most of the summer only partially conscious, and this morning was no exception. Her body automatically went through the motions of keeping Yuri's foot as clean as it could be, gulping down sweat, sucking up toe jam, and breathing in the stinging bouquet of body odor in the air. She didn't have any control over her actions anyway, this was just what her insole body naturally did. In this state, her foot fetish dominated her conscious mind, and all that registered within her was a pleasurable sensation as she took in all the stink. This was her whole life now. Her body had adapted to its surroundings, keeping only the functions necessary for cleaning feet and storing everything else deep within the recesses of her mind. If Sarah were to think about anything now, it would probably be a simple thought of how grateful she was for the divine foot that provided all that she needed. She could no longer access her memories of anything outside the sneaker anyways.

-----

「友里？これ六ヶ月にスニーカー三足でしょう。活動的ã ª子だといって、不自然じゃない？足病医に相談したらどう ？」(Yuri? This makes three pairs of sneakers in six months. You're an active girl, but doesn't this seem unnatural? Why don't we see a podiatrist?)

「まあ、別に構わないけど…」(It doesn't really bother me, though...)

「馬鹿げたこと言わないで、友里。医者に行こう。」(Don 't be ridiculous, Yuri. We're going to a doctor.)

「はい…」(Okay...)

「あっ、靴と言えば、前のスニーカーを捨てるのを忘れã ªいでね。臭い家が欲しくない。」(Oh, speaking of shoes, don't forget to throw out your old ones. I don't want the house to smell.)

---

That night, Sarah's sneaker was taken outside and thrown in the garbage, though she was still too far gone to notice anything different. Going a few days without direct contact with Yuri's feet wasn't out of the ordinary, and there was still plenty of leftover stench to soak up, besides. Shortly afterwards, the garbage truck came and collected her, taking her away from the only person she had "known" for the last half a year.

Thanks to her mother's meddling, Yuri would eventually find a remedy for her feet's overproductive sweat glands, but Sarah was no longer around to experience the results of this, having been delivered to the local junkyard. Before she had any chance of coming out of her foot stink coma, the garbage she was in had already been processed and sorted. Her sneaker was brought to a sizeable heap of similar shoes, and dumped unceremoniously on top.

-----

As time went by, nature took its course on the pile of footwear, and soon Sarah's shoe began to decompose. Other discarded shoes were later thrown on top of the pile too, leaving Sarah somewhere in the center of it all. After longer still, the insole she was bonded to finally fell away, releasing her inconceivably battered body. Now liberated, her head and limbs reformed, though the compact space within the shoe pile prevented her from fully returning to her original size. Even this change, however, was not enough to break her out of her stupor. She simply readjusted, now using her normal nose and mouth to do the same shoe cleaning as before. She buried her face deep within a fresh sandal and began eagerly licking the impressions left by its previous owner's toes. There was still much work to be done.

"Oh sarah sweetheart, I have so many chores today I was wondering if you could just take one or two... You woke late in the early start of the night having slept the morning away. Now at the age of 26 you were living a mostly independent life now. You were home for the summer that would be soon ending and returning to your apartment with your friends Jenna and Madison for a 4th year of college. Thanks to Trish giving you a job at her booming industry of gummy clothes you were swimming in cash that helped you and your friends be able in affording an apartment close by the campus. The lay out of the apartment had one kitchen, a giant living room for parties, one bathroom, and 2 bedrooms. Jenna and you thought it was best to give Madison a complete room to herself and share the other one so the smell wouldn't bother the two of you.

You weren’t even fully awake when Trish number popped up on your phone ringing “Hey Trish!” you answer sleepy. “Sarah are you sleeping again? Don’t forget your meeting with me and some else tomorrow I have a little competition planned.” She tells you. You laughed after little remark “Ok well I’ll see you tomorrow.” and hung up on her. If only she knew you already had the work she need done for her, finishing the last design for her next product line last night in your sketchbook. After sleeping the whole day, you needed to get out of the house for a little fun time.

Unlocking your phone, you scroll through your context list but didn’t know who to call. Most of the numbers were either friends or recent flings with women you had met in life. But you wanted someone new to get in some romance with and tried Tinder. Scrolling through a ton of pretty girls on the app it was a hard choice to make if only you could decide. Dana gasped as she saw a gummy orb with your skin tone pop out of the machine. "Well... maybe it's just a coincidence. This can't be her..." The uncoordinated girl turned the orb around and cringed as she saw your face on it. "Oops... Sorry, Sara", she said as she began to set you down to reform... but quickly changed her mind. "But... maybe we should keep this a secret", Dana said as she moved you back. You tried your best to scream in anger, but your current form meant that you could only sit there in silent rage as your incompetent coworker stuffed you into the pocket of her coat. "I'm sorry, but I just got this job", she said. "This is too good of an opportunity to let slip by."

You wanted to scream at her as you were squished between the fabric. You wished Dana had let you reform or given you to Trish, as you wouldn't have ratted her out. Not because you were nice, but Trish wouldn't have fired her anyway. She was far too nice and forgiving to fire anyone, regardless of how bad they were at their job. Whenever any firings did take place, it was thanks to pressure from the board of directors. Even though Trish had given you some authority around here, you had never sat in for the board meetings. You could tell they were pretty rough, though, as Trish was always stressed out going into and coming back from them.
Dana swept up the shredded bits of your clothes into the trash and gathered the rest of the gummy orbs into the case to be reused for later. She then went over to the break room to eat her lunch and wait for Trish, barely noticing a light *squelch* as she sat. She wriggled her rear to get comfortable, causing a muffled screaming noise with each shift of her booty. "What on earth is that?", she asked as she got up, gasping as she saw what looked like a young boy squashed into the shape of her butt! "Oh my god, I am so sorry!", she said as she peeled him off of the chair.

It didn't take long for him to reform and he immediately began screaming at her. "What the hell is your problem?!", he yelled. "Why don't you watch where you're fixing to stick your fat butt?!" You immediately recognized the high-pitched, whiny screaming as Jack. You had almost forgotten that he and his friends had began working at the company this week as interns. "One more big push!" the doctor said.


Jenna screamed as she gave it all she's got. Then in the midst of her screaming you heard the cries of your newborn. The nurse wrapped the baby up in a blanket as they presented them to you. Jenna started crying immediately swearing she never let any harm come their way. You never felt happier now then your wedding day.


Exiting out the room you find everyone gathered in the lobby. Jack and Mary with their kids, Trish, Barbara, and Madison waiting to hear the news as you tell them it's a.....

1) Sarah cannot die, so don't do it.

2) Be sure to use proper grammar and spelling.

3) Make chapters more than one sentence.
